column2: The Planets Align! As Cultists in cities around the world celebrate, Astronomers and Astrologers both study a phenomena that occurs only approximately every twenty years.
The Planets Align! Cultists around the world celebrate! Astronomers and Astrologers both study this rare conjunction.
The Planets Align! Cultists around the world celebrate!
The end times approach nigh! The Old Ones are returning!
The end times approach nigh! Dagon is returning!
The end times approach nigh! Yig is returning!
We have more than we need, we must help the other cults!
Our loyal followers deserve some rewards! We will be taking everything from them soon enough!
We have an excess of money in the government coffers! Maybe we should distribute a small amount to the masses. We will be taking it back from them soon enough!
